rules_text:
When Transport Cart enters, create an Energy Cell token and a 1/1 white Citizen creature token. [i](An Energy Cell token is a colorless artifact token with “{T}, Sacrifice this: Add {C}.”)[/i]
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
